version_description:
- Fixed the inconvenience of not being able to open use page right after game.
- "Hide opponent's stats" option added.
- Minor fixes.

- Fixed 'Play now' button being disabled after a game.
- A few other minor bug fixes.
- Fixed bugs introduced in the previous version.

- A few bug fixes.
- Tournaments.
- A few bug fixes.
- Minor bug fix.

- Display disk counts.
- 1-minute mode.
- User profile.
- A few bug fixes.
- Fixed the bug where 1-min was unplayable on iPad.

- Display opening names.
- Minor fixes.
- Minor bug fix.

- Added opening names.
- Minor bug fixes.

- Now stats are recorded for each opening a user has played.
- Fixed bugs.
- Bug fix.
- Fixed a bug that was causing the app to crash.

- Minor bug fix.
- Added new opening names.

- Reversi Wars is now renamed Othello Quest
- Some bug fixes.
- Added endgames problems. (MyPage -> Menu)

- Changed default disk graphics (you can choose the former graphics from the options page).
- (iPad only) Fixed a but where 'next' button didn't work in the problem mode.
- Fixed a bug where loading mypage could take forever.
- Official tournament mode is implemented.
- A few small updates regarding tournaments.
- Minor bug fix.

- Added new openings.
- Added new problems and show the number of problems solved.
- Improved designs.
- A few bug fixes.
- Now you can customize time control and also choose XOT(randomized opening) in friend match mode.
- Fixed a minor bug.
- Minor fix.
- A few bug fixes.

- Fixed a few bugs.
- You can now report malicious users.
